about.text: Lokabees - the initiative for a colorful neighborhood and the digitization of local retail. The team consists of around 20 committed specialists from the areas of development, User Experience, marketing and business development as well as numerous other supporters who work together on lokabees.
about.title: About Lokabees

contact.text: Get the latest infos about new features, new shops, local updates and more by joining our newsletter!
contact.title: Let's stay in contact!

shop_list.no_shops: No stores in this area have signed up to Lokabees yet. Contact us via hello@lokabees.com if you would like to see a particular store in your area on lokabees.de.
